Description.$t: Debate team champion? Best-dressed upperclass-man? Class president? Oswald's always had a need to be the best at what he does, whether it's looking good, shoving freshmen into lockers, or accidentally finding himself in front of cameras. But prom week is the ultimate challenge: who will come out on top? Who will be utterly crushed? And *what* will they be wearing when it happens?

GoalDescription.words: Get Oswald a date, with someone popular of course. And make sure that heel Buzz doesn't blow things with his current GF.

taskNaturalLanguage.words: Get Oswald ###OSWALD### a date ###DATING### with someone
Make sure the someone ###OSWALD### is dating is popular ###POPULAR###
Have Buzz ###BUZZ### maintain his relationship ###DATING### with Naomi ###NAOMI###

ToDoItem.name: It's Complicated

GoalDescription.words: Wouldn't it be fun to see Oswald date, be friends with, *and* be enemies with the same person. Give it a shot!

ToDoItem.$c: There's someone in Oswald's life that he just can't get out of his head... largely because he both hates and loves this person simultaneously.  It's complicated."/>

taskNaturalLanguage.words: Get Oswald ###OSWALD### to become friends ###FRIENDS### with someone
Get Oswald ###OSWALD### to start dating ###DATING### the same person
Get Oswald ###OSWALD### to become enemies ###ENEMIES### with the same person

GoalDescription.words: Nicholas has been a rival of Oswald for practically forever.  He's good.  Make Oswald better.

taskNaturalLanguage.words: Ensure ###NICHOLAS### has at least four friends ###FRIENDS###
Ensure ###OSWALD### has at least five friends ###FRIENDS###
Get Nicholas ###NICHOLAS### and Kate ###KATE### to break up ###NOT DATING###
Have Oswald ###OSWALD### swoop in and start dating ###DATING### Kate ###KATE###

<ToDoItem name="Get What's Coming To You">
					<Condition>
						<Rule>
							<Predicate type="SFDB label" first="initiator" second="responder" label="mean" negated="false" intent="false" isSFDB="true" window="0" numTimesUniquelyTrueFlag="true" numTimesUniquelyTrue="3" numTimesRoleSlot="both"/>

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Well, this was a waste of time.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What do you mean, Oswald?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I mean this is pathetic. Nothing turned out the way I wanted it to. Nobody listened to me. This is all wrong!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: All wrong? Look around you, %buddy%.
People are dancing, music's playing. The gym has never been this clean.
Most people are having a great time!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: And that's all it takes for you to have a good time, huh %r%?
Cheesy music and some pathetic lights strung across the ceiling?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Well, yeah. Pretty much.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: ...really?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oswald. It's your prom night. Lighten up and try to enjoy it.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: *sigh*. I suppose I could give it a try.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: That's the spirit!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: But if you ever touch me again, I *will* take out a restraining order.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %i% my man... how's your prom night going?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Reasonably well, Buzz. Your own? How's Naomi?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: She's cool, man. We've been talking about football, and basketball...
Even some totally crazy far out stuff like hockey!
It's been awesome. How are you and your sweetie doing?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Good. Although I needed to escape for a bit and catch my breath.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yeah I know what you mean. Naomi seemed really keen to go get some punch by herself for some reason.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey Buzz... look. We've always been friends, sort of, even though we're not really in the same fashion, socioeconomic, or intellectual class.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: But we were in American History class together, man. That was HELLA tight.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Uhm, yes, I suppose.
What I'm trying to say is....
It's good to have you as a friend.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Bros before hoes, dude.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Quite.
%greeting%, %buddy%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %greeting%, %pejorative%. Having a nice prom night?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: With you here? Absolutely.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Are you being sarcastic? I seriously can't even tell any more.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Very funny.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: No! I wasn't being sarcastic just then! God, %sweetie%, you can be such a pain sometimes.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Seriously, what are you getting out of this? What IS this, even? I don't know whether you love me or hate me.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Both, I guess. Is that weird?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: It's pretty weird.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: And kind of hot.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: No.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh come on. It totally is.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You're impossible.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Dance with me?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh, I suppose.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oswald, you bastard.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I think you mean 'you magnificent bastard.'

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You just always have to get the upper hand, don't you? Everything I want you always have to have one more, is that it?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: That's right.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: My outfits, my friends, even my girlfriend...
All our lives you've been one-upping me. What's the point? What are you trying to prove?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I don't need to *prove* anything, Nicholas my boy.
It's really rather clear to everyone who's the better man.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You're right, Oswald.
It's clear to everyone what kind of man you are.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Crystal clear.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: See! You just did it again! I was going to have the last word and you TOTALLY stepped all over me!
Just because this is your story you think you can-
Oswald, you bastard.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I think you mean 'you magnificent bastard.'

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You just always have to get the upper hand, don't you? Everything I want you always have to have one more, is that it?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: That's right.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: My outfits, my friends, even my girlfriend...
All our lives you've been one-upping me. What's the point? What are you trying to prove?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I don't need to *prove* anything, Nicholas my boy.
It's really rather clear to everyone who's the better man.

It's clear to everyone what kind of man you are.

Just because this is your story you think you can-
